Back To Recipes

recipe

Get out the following ingredients:

spaghetti sauce 25 ounce
water 1 cup
lentil penne 8 ounce
olive oil 1 ounce
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 26 Minutes

Recipe:

Add the following to the instant pot
> 25 ounces spaghetti sauce
> 1 cup water
> 8 ounces lentil penne
> 1 ounce olive oil
Stir instant pot
| Pressure cook on high pressure for 11 minutes, (Preheat takes 15 min) (Takes 26 minutes)
Release steam valve and serve

Get out the following ingredients:

spaghetti sauce 25 ounce
water 1 cup
lentil penne 8 ounce
olive oil 1 ounce
Show Ingrendients

Estimated Time: 22 Minutes

Recipe:

Add the following to the instant pot
> 25 ounces spaghetti sauce
> 1 cup water
> 8 ounces lentil penne
> 1 ounce olive oil
Stir instant pot
| Pressure cook on high pressure for 7 minutes, (Preheat takes 15 min) (Takes 22 minutes)
Release steam valve and serve
